Title: Relates to requiring members of a board of trustees of public, free association and Indian libraries to complete two hours of continuing education per year
Summary: Requires members of a board of trustees of public, free association and Indian libraries to complete two hours of continuing education per year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring members of a board of trustees of public, free association and Indian libraries to complete two hours of continuing education per year
